div.p: Sensitivities to changes in SO 2 and BC emissions. Global mean instantaneous aerosol radiative forcing ( a) and change in the mean surface air temperature ( b) with emission perturbations of SO 2 (blue) and BC (red) from fuel sources relative to the present emissions simulated by MIROC-SPRINTARS. Error bars represent one standard deviation in annual mean values. Changes in surface air temperatures are from the simulations coupled with OGCM.
